fieldLabel: Count of days from the release start date to calculate closure rate for prediction

tooltip.definition: If this field is kept blank, then daily closure rate of issues is calculated based on the number of working days between today and the release start date or date when the first issue was added. This configuration allows you to decide from which date the closure rate should be calculated.

fieldLabel: Issue type to identify Production incidents

tooltip.definition: All issue types that are used as/equivalent to Production incidents.

This field is used to identify if a production incident is raised by third party or client:
1. CustomField : If a separate custom field is used
2. Labels : If a label is used to identify. Example: PROD_DEFECT (This has to be one value).

Provide customfield name to identify Production Incident.
Example: customfield_13907
Provide label name to identify Production Incident Example: PROD_INCIDENT <hr>
The statuses wherein no activity takes place and signifies that issue is in queue
All statuses that signify an issue is 'DONE' based on 'Definition Of Done'

fieldLabel: Status to identify start of development

tooltip.definition:
Status from workflow on which issue is started development.
Example: In Analysis

fieldLabel: Status to identify QA completed issues

tooltip.definition: Status that confirms that the QA work is completed and an issue can be ready for signoff/close

fieldLabel: Status when 'Story' issue type is created

tooltip.definition: All issue types that identify with a Story.

fieldLabel: Status when issue type is put on Hold

tooltip.definition: All status that identify hold/blocked statuses.
Enabled State (KPI will populate w.r.t Dev Completion date), given that the Dev Completion Status is provided.

fieldLabel: Status to identify In Ready For Dev

tooltip.definition: All statuses that correspond to refined status of Iteration Readiness.

fieldLabel: Status to identify In Not Refined issues

tooltip.definition: All statuses that correspond to not refined status of Iteration Readiness.

fieldLabel: Root cause values to be excluded

tooltip.definition: Root cause reasons for defects which are to be excluded.
This field is used to identify Risk Issue type.
This field is used to identify Dependency Issue type.

fieldLabel: Resolution type to identify rejected defects

tooltip.definition: Resolution types for defects that can be excluded from 'Defect Removal Efficiency' calculation
All workflow statuses used to reject defects

fieldLabel: Labels to filter issues in consideration

Specify issue types to exclude from KPI calculations.

fieldLabel: Issue type to identify Story category

Target KPI value denotes the bare minimum a project should maintain for a KPI. User should just input the number and the unit like percentage, hours will automatically be considered. If the threshold is empty, then a common target KPI line will be shown
